item.title: Useful commands and scripts
item.description: TAR Command to archive just the given folder ( no absolute paths ) tar -cvf file_name.tar -C ~/ folder_to_be_archived -C option will make tar command to change it’s directory from whereever it is to ~/ (home path) To install ncurses lib on fedora sudo dnf install ncurses-devel-6.4-7.20230520.fc39.x86_64 Note - Hit tab after nucrses-devel. It will pick up available version.
